Key Match Events: Sikandar Raza picked up three for 25 against Pakistan.
Zimbabwe won by one run to register their first Super 12 victory at the T20 World Cup.
Mohammed Nawaz was caught for 22 from the penultimate ball of the match off Brad Evans.
Pakistan restricted Zimbabwe to 130 for eight but scored one fewer for the loss of the same number of wickets.
Mohammed Rizwan was dismissed for 14 after chopping a delivery from Blessing Muzarabani onto his stumps.
Shaan Masood scored a composed 44 before being stumped off a Raza wide.
Shadab Khan took three wickets for 23 runs.
Mohammad Wasim took four wickets for 24 runs.
Shaheen Afridi was run out off the last ball.
Post-Match Reflections: Sikandar Raza expressed his belief in the Zimbabwe team and rated the victory as the best since he has been part of Zimbabwe cricket.
Pakistan captain Babar Azam stated that the team was not up to the mark in all three departments.
